caption.p: ( a) Crystal structures of TlGaTe 2. The illustration shows the legends for the different type of atoms; ( b) calculated HSE06 electronic band structure of TlGaTe 2; ( c) total and site projected density of states of TlGaTe 2. The Fermi level is set to zero. (colour code: red-Ga, green-Te, blue-Tl).
